page.title: 03 FARMING
page.content:
The farmers were asked the following questions; 1. Who is the owner of this farm ? 2. What size is it ? 3. What stock do you carry ? 4. What crops do you grow ? 5. What machinery do you use ? 6. How many workers do you employ ? 7. Do you like living here ? 8. What do you do in your leisure time ? 9. What improvements would you like to see in the area ?
The ten farms had a total acreage of 1667 acres or 530,458.89 hectares.About thirty per cent of this area was devoted to barley, with wheat, turnips, grass, potatoes, oats and oil seed rape also being grown.
